title: Grid Resilience Warden

dimensions.label: SLO & Error Budget Design
dimensions.description: Definition and usage of SLOs to drive reliability decisions.

bands.label: Unmeasured
bands.criteria: No SLOs/SLIs defined; 'uptime' is vague. Alerts on everything or nothing.

bands.label: Defined
bands.criteria: Defines basic availability/latency SLOs. Mentions error budgets but not how they affect decisions.

bands.label: Driving
bands.criteria: SLOs are clear, user-centric, and drive policy (e.g. freeze feature launches effectively when budget burns).

dimensions.label: Failure Mode Coverage & Mitigation
dimensions.description: Strategies for handling partial failure, overload, and dependency loss.

bands.label: Fragile
bands.criteria: System likely cascades on failure. No circuit breakers, load shedding, or meaningful retries/backoff.

bands.label: Defensive
bands.criteria: Includes basic defenses like retries and timeouts. Blast radius is considered but large.

bands.label: Resilient
bands.criteria: Comprehensive defense: circuit breaking, aggressive load shedding, graceful degradation, and tight failure domains.

dimensions.label: Observability & Alert Design
dimensions.description: Quality of signals and alert routing.

bands.label: Noisy/Blind
bands.criteria: Logs are sparse or flooding; alerts are noisy and non-actionable. Debugging is guesswork.

bands.label: Visible
bands.criteria: Good dashboard coverage. Alerts exist but might be flaky or cause fatigue.

bands.label: Signal
bands.criteria: Structured logs, distributed tracing, and symptom-based alerting. Clear path from alert to root cause.

dimensions.label: Incident Lifecycle & Learning
dimensions.description: Deployment safety, incident response, and postmortem culture.

bands.label: Hero-based
bands.criteria: Deploys are 'scary events'. Incident response relies on heroes. No postmortems.

bands.label: Process-based
bands.criteria: Automated pipelines exists. Incidents have some structure. Postmortems happen but maybe blame-heavy.

bands.label: Antifragile
bands.criteria: Progressive delivery (canary). Automated rollbacks. Blameless postmortems that drive architectural fixes.

grade_bands.label: C
grade_bands.description: Likely to suffer major, unrecoverable outages.

llm_judge_instructions: Evaluate the Resilience Architecture Blueprint. Look for practical SRE patterns (SLOs, Circuit Breakers, Postmortems). Penalize vague assurances of 'high availability' without mechanism.
